Name: Bandit's Knife
Availability: Starting weapon for the Thief class Undead Assassin drop
Special Note: Strong attack is replaced by a large horizontal slash that can be continued with additional input. Bleed build up is 30 per strike and does 30% of enemies total HP when inflicted.

Name: Dagger
Availability: Starting weapon for the Sorcerer class Sold by Undead Merchant (Male)

Name: Dark Silver Tracer
Availability: Given by Lord's Blade Ciaran in exchange for Soul of Artorias Lord's Blade Ciaran drop
Special Note: Has the highest Critical Bonus of any weapon in the game

Name: Ghost Blade
Special Note: Cursed weapon that can be used to engage Ghosts in New Londo Ruins. Strong attack is replaced with a double horizontal slash that can be followed up by a triple slash with an additional input.

Name: Parrying Dagger
Special Note: Left handed parry has unique animation that has a longer parrying window.

Name: Priscilla's Dagger
Special Note: Strong attack is replaced with a rising slash into a downward slash that can be followed up by a spinning horizontal slash with an additional input. Bleed build up is 20 per strike and once inflicted does 50% of the enemy's total HP.
